text:
Kentik | JS and/or Go Engineer | San Francisco, CA | Full-time | ONSITE, REMOTE

Kentik is a company collecting network telemetry and making it useful. We run a custom database, anomaly detection engine and visualization system. Work as a true full stack engineer, from the local storage filesystem all the way up to browser clients. Handle trillions of data points per day.

Hiring for JS, Rust and Go devs, remote or in SF.

https://www.kentik.com/careers/
